name: Impermanence (Simon Hutchinson)
description:
Impermanence is a "notgame" that demonstrates procedurally generated sonic worlds of ambient (new age?) music using Euclidean rhythms and Markov chains.

Opportunities for expansion include a wider variety of styles and instruments, but these could all be tailored to individual projects (e.g. synthwave aesthetics or gothic choirs).

Please contact me with questions and comments!
